lyrics:
I love when you pullin' up in your Jeep, bumpin' all your beats,
Js on, with your shades on, just to bring me something to eat...
You the man up in these streets, but when it comes to my heart,
That don't mean a thing, no...

So I hop up in your ride - Ooh, it's hot as hell outside;
Got the top down with the doors off with your hand on my thigh...
Drive slow... take your time...

Every little thing you do got me feeling some type of way; (Way...)
When you gimme that thunder, you make my summer rain...
(Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh oh-oh...)
(Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh oh-oh...) Every day, every day...

And it won't stop... (Boom, boom, boom...)
And it won't stop... (Boom, boom, boom...) Yeah...

With every single part of me (oh), my love for you is constantly (oh)
Forever and ever on repeat (oh), on repeat,
And it won't stop... (Oh, oh, ooh, ooh...)

I love when we pulling up to that beach, sand all in my feet,
Sun down, nobody 'round - that's one hell of a scene...
You rockin' my body, rock, rock the boat - Aaliyah - don't it sound familar?

'Cause it feels like ah-ah, ay-ay, lookin' up into spa-ace;
It's just me and my ba-ae, and it feels so ama-azing,
Oh, ooh... all night, whoa...

Every little thing you do got me feeling some type of way; (Way...)
When you gimme that thunder, you make my summer rain...
(Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh oh-oh...)
(Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh oh-oh...) Every day, every day...

And it won't stop... (Boom, boom, boom...)
And it won't stop... (Boom, boom, boom...) Yeah...

With every single part of me (oh), my love for you is constantly (oh)
Forever and ever on repeat (oh), on repeat,
And it won't stop... (Oh, oh, ooh, ooh...)

Every day... every day, I can't breathe;
You take my breath away from me - Here's my heart, you got the key...
Put that on eternity - I love you till infinity,
Infinity, infinity, infinity, infinity...

My babe... my everything;
And when I think about it, don't be making me wait, baby...
It won't ever stop, my heart won't skip a beat, baby,
And it'll keep goin' on, goin' on, goin' on...

And it won't stop... (Boom, boom, boom...)
And it won't stop... (Boom, boom, boom...) Yeah...

With every single part of me (oh), my love for you is constantly (oh)
Forever and ever on repeat (oh), on repeat,
And it won't stop... (Oh, oh, ooh, ooh...)
